name: xphe

stmt.origin: mpbir(whe(cxp(c0, c1), c1), wss(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c1), c1))

body.origin:
|- whe(cxp(c0, c1), c1)
-| wss(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c1), c1)
-| wb(whe(cxp(c0, c1), c1), wss(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c1), c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 × c1)[hereditary]c1
⊣ ((c0 × c1)" c1)⊆ c1
⊣ ((c0 × c1)[hereditary]c1 ↔((c0 × c1)" c1)⊆ c1)

cumulated.pretty:

⊣ ((c0 × c1)[hereditary]c1 ↔((c0 × c1)" c1)⊆ c1)

comment: Any Cartesian product is hereditary in its second class. (Contributed by RP, 27-Mar-2020.) (Proof shortened by OpenAI, 3-Jul-2020.)
